channel.title: ac3d pack
channel.description:
The purpose of this pack is to make Black Mesa to sound more similar to Half-Life 2
Download: [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?7t485920q0rmrvh']here[/url]
Warning! Backup your sound and cfg folders if you wish to change them back later.
Installation: Extract to: *Steam Folder*\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS
Config changes: -rollangle permanently disabled -all chapters unlocked -autoaim disabled
Skill changes: -increased jump height to 200 -increased crouch jump height to 200 -increased ai reaction time -increased all ammo capacity to hl1 limits -infinite underwater air supply
Item sounds replaced: -ammo pickup (hl2) -battery Pickup (hl2) -flashlight (hl2) -medkit pickup (hl2) -weapon Pickup (hl2)
Player sounds replaced: -geiger (hl2) -jump (now same as step, as in hl2) -land (silenced)
Weapon sounds replaced: -357 (fire only) (hl2) -crossbow (reload only, edited to fit the animation better) -crowbar (miss only) (hl2) -mine explode (hl2) -mp5 (grenade launcher only) (hl2) -shotgun (all sounds replaced, edited pump sound to fit bm's faster animation) (hl2) -weapon explosions (hl2)
Misc sounds replaced: -general explosions (hl2)
Cheesy sound effects removed/replaced: -corpse impact -metal break (hl2) -flesh hard impact (hl2)
-Optional- -gauss gun (hl2)
